sources.title: My Boyfriend In Orange (2022)
sources.description: After Moe Sasaki's father died, her family moved to her mother's hometown. At her new high school, Moe has a hard time getting along with her classmates and becomes a loner. She then meets firefighter Kyosuke Ebihara and falls in love with him. Thanks to him, Moe's personality becomes brighter.
